title: Xbox News is Coming Every Month - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.05.20
description:
Blessing and Imran discuss Microsoft's plan for showcasing the Xbox Series X. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:06:16 - Housekeeping
THE CORE STREAM IS HAPPENING! Core is the game where you whip up your own multiplayer video games, publish them, and play them with the world. THURSDAY at 3 p.m. PT join Greg, Andy, and the developers of Core as they make games and test them out with you. That’s right go download the Core Alpha right now at coregames.com and you can play whatever they create LIVE on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. Follow @CoreGames on Twitter for updates!
There’s another sponsored Predator: Hunting Grounds Stream this afternoon at 2 pm! Kevin and SnowBikeMike are joining the insanity! twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Remember: We’re reacting live to this week’s Inside Xbox as they show off games for next gen. That’s happening this Thursday at 8am Pacific right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:08 - Xbox is doing monthly showcases leading up to the Series X - Jerret West, CVP, Gaming Marketing @ Xbox
00:17:20 - Today, Xbox announced that they're going to do monthly "xbox 20/20" events for the rest of the year. They've mentioned that May will focus on third party games, while July will focus on first party games. My question to you, is where does that leave June? - Best Friends Q:Amplitude
00:27:00 - We now know what’s up with Doom Eternal's Soundtrack Controversy - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:34:00 - Now while it seems the relationship is strained (to say the least) is Id actually trying to heal the relationship for future games or was this just a blanket PR statement and they are never going to use Mick ever again? - Best Friends Q:Borzen00
00:38:30 - THQ Nordic and Koch Media are trading IPs like Pokemon cards - Brendain Sinclair @ Gamesindustry.biz
00:45:49 - Cyberpunk 2077 News Broadcast Coming in June - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:49:10 - There’s a new Last of Us 2 trailer coming tomorrow
00:50:00 - Mortal Kombat is getting DLC Revealed tomorrow
00:56:00 - Out today
Reader mail   -
01:00:40 - With Yakuza being another exclusive in the line of PlayStation ports coming, do you think Sony will create a PlayStation app similar to Xbox's beta app on PC? - Frankfurtter
01:04:45 - Squad Up: Gondors Condor(Destiny PS4) - Irish_Manhattan
0106:00: - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
